title: Software Engineer I
reason: HubSpot's 'Engineer I' is specifically designed for new graduates and juniors. As a large multinational, they are a registered sponsor for Critical Skills Employment Permits in Ireland. Rahul's background in Java, JavaScript, and his TU Dublin degree make him a strong candidate for this entry-level pipeline.

title: Junior Software Engineer
reason: This is a perfect entry-level match for Rahul's Java background and TU Dublin degree. Mastercard is a large multinational known for providing visa sponsorship for high-potential technical talent in Ireland.
